tool_description: Archives and indexes document-based evidence such as procedures, training records, maintenance logs, and other relevant paperwork for incident investigations.

incident_id.description: Unique incident identifier to associate documents with

document_titles.description: Titles or names of documents being archived

document_types.description: Types of documents: procedure, training_record, maintenance_log, safety_report, communication, policy, other

document_dates.description: Creation or effective dates of the documents

document_sources.description: Sources or origins of the documents

archivist_name.description: Name of person archiving the documents

error_messages: Invalid incident ID: Incident ID must correspond to an existing investigation case.
Array length mismatch: All document arrays (titles, types, dates, sources) must have equal length.
Invalid document type: Each type must be one of [procedure, training_record, maintenance_log, safety_report, communication, policy, other].
Invalid document dates: All dates must be in valid ISO 8601 format.
Missing document information: All required arrays must contain at least one item.
Too many documents: Maximum 25 documents can be archived in single batch.
Relevance notes mismatch: If provided, relevance_notes array must match document count.
usage: Provide incident_id, document_titles, document_types, document_dates, document_sources arrays, and archivist_name. All arrays must have matching lengths. Optionally provide relevance_notes array.

document_archive_ids.description: Unique identifiers assigned to each archived document

archive_timestamp.description: When documents were archived into evidence system

indexing_completed.description: Whether documents have been indexed for search

storage_location.description: Physical or digital storage location reference
